text: Even though I couldn't get into the game, I love this song so much. The melody is so nice, the rhythm so catchy, the lyrics so beautiful, and it's got that special something that fills a niche in my heart and makes me look forward to it every time I go through the playlist. Thank you for uploading. : )

author: Evilriku13

text:
Im really sad that people dont give the SaGa series more love. ESPECIALLY in the West. 

Also I take offense to the "Lacking Gameplay " comment below. SaGa games are super fun. Sure they are a bit hard, and Unlimited SaGa;s gameplay is VERY dire, but the other games are buttery sweet! If you guys hate the difficulty, try the Final Fantasy Legend games.(Yes, they ARE SaGa games, they had to use the Final Fantasy Name to lure buyers) They are much easier yet no less rewarding. Also keep in mind that FFL is kinda edited censored so you might want to go with the Wonderswan version instead.  Amazing games.

text: oh oh oh man i remember renting this game one day and having such a blast with it. i learned in hindsight that it wasn't as good as i remembered or something?? either way, it was still a great game that I really do hope to pick up again, despite its supposed faults. The music is certainly lovely, though, and I fondly enjoy each Romancing Saga song in your playlists.
